title: What is Volibears cast range?
body: Sometimes it seems to be 1 tile, sometimes it seems to be 3, the inconsistency is shocking

replies.body: It seems to be that he first looks for targets next to him, then he moves one tile and checks again, and if he then doesn't have a nearby opponent, he casts on the closest target regardless of total distance.
I have seen {{champion:106}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3089}} stand still and sequentially oneshot an entire team from across the board.
